com.mesosphere.mesos.rx.java.test

Class TcpSocketProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.mesos.rx.java.test.TcpSocketProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public final class TcpSocketProxy
extends Object
implements Closeable
    A utility class that can used to create a proxy between Mesos and your client, and then close the connection to verify behavior.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TcpSocketProxy(@NotNull InetSocketAddress listen, @NotNull InetSocketAddress destination)
      Define a proxy between two addresses.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TcpSocketProxy

        public TcpSocketProxy(@NotNull
                      @NotNull InetSocketAddress listen,
                      @NotNull
                      @NotNull InetSocketAddress destination)
        Define a proxy between two addresses. All bytes sent to listen will be forwarded to destination and vice versa. Due to this proxy being "dumb" (raw sockets listening and opened to destination) socket level smarts like TLS are not necessarily supported.
        Parameters:
        listen - The InetSocketAddress the proxy should listen on.
        destination - The InetSocketAddress the proxy should open a socket to.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Start the proxy in the background.

      • getListenPort

        public int getListenPort()
        Get the port the proxy is listening on. This method will block until the proxy is up and running, meaning start() will need to be called before this method can return a value.
        Returns:
        The port the proxy is listening on.

      • isShutdown

        public boolean isShutdown()
        Returns a boolean indicating whether the proxy has been shutdown or not.
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating whether the proxy has been shutdown or not.

      • close

        public void close()
        Useful wrapper method allowing the use of a proxy in a try-with block.

        Calls shutdown() and tears down all background threads.

        Specified by:
        close in interface Closeable
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        See Also:
        shutdown()

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Immediately run the shutdown process for this proxy.

        Shutting down the proxy will result in all open sockets being closed and the listening socket being closed.

        This method will block until shutdown has completed.

        See Also:
        shutdownIn(long, TimeUnit)

      • shutdownIn

        public void shutdownIn(long delay,
                       @NotNull
                       @NotNull TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Run the shutdown process for this proxy in delay timeUnit.
        Parameters:
        delay - The time from now to when shutdown should begin
        timeUnit - The time unit of the delay parameter
        See Also:
        ScheduledExecutorService.schedule(Callable, long, TimeUnit)
